DOC.brief_title: T790M Mutation ctDNA Patients With NSCLC After EGFR-TKI Failure
DOC.detailed_description: An observational , non-interventional , multi-central study comparison frequency abundance T790M mutation use amplification refractory mutation system ( ARMS ) digital droplet PCR ( ddPCR ) method among different Clinical mode non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) patient epidermal growth factor receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor ( EGFR-TKI ) failure
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm stage IIIB/IV NSCLC .
